package.name: Notch Glow
package.shortDescription: Notch Glow - Make that notch look colourful

descriptionlist.description: Notch Glow makes the notch look better by adding a colourful glow behind it

changelog.change: Colors can now be picked using libcolorpicker
Added Shadow timescale slider the higher the value the long the animation
Added Glow timescale slider the higher the value the long the animation
